name: Chaos Choir
description:
NOTES: WASD or arrow keys to play. If it's too laggy maybe try the windows build. There's a known issue with the browser player where sounds play incorrectly after lvl 2, rather uncommon, can be resolved with a page refresh in some cases.

Chaos choir is a choral experience like no other! Travel the land and sing your way towards a surprising goal.

Made for Minijam 121: reflection.
The limitation was "Windows as a Mechanic"

CREDITS
Morgan Ridley-Smith - Composer and Sound Designer
https://youtube.com/@morganainsleymusic
Gwyneth Esteban - Artist
https://gwynethe.artstation.com/
Reece Williams (me) - Programming
